Bulletin 88 JIG Standards - Update February 2016 
 
JIG 1 - Aviation Fuel Quality Control & Operating Standards for Into-Plane Fuelling Services, and 
JIG 2 - Aviation Fuel Quality Control & Operating Standards for Airport Depots & Hydrants 
JIG 4 - Aviation Fuel Quality Control & Operating Standards for Smaller Airports 
 
This bulletin is issued as an update to Operations Bulletin 85 which announced the publication of Issue 12 of 
JIG Standards 1 & 2. 
 
Issue 3 of JIG 4 is now available to purchase from the Online Shop/Publications area of the website 
www.jigonline.com 
JIG 4 is available to download as a pdf document or for delivery as A5 size hard copies. All copies are priced 
at PS150 each, but we are pleased to confirm that the Member price will remain at PS25 per copy. 
Issue 3 of JIG 4 - Summary of Changes 
A separate document (Summary of Changes) detailing where the changes have been made to Issue 2 is also 
available to download as a pdf from the Publications page, free of charge to all purchasers of the Standard. 
JIG Inspection Checklists 
The JIG Inspection Checklist based on Issue 12 is now available from the website, free of charge to all 
purchasers of JIG 1 and JIG 2 Standards. 
A JIG Inspection Checklist based on EI/JIG 1530 requirements for upstream terminals

sed on Issue 12 is now available from the website, free of charge to all 
purchasers of JIG 1 and JIG 2 Standards. 
A JIG Inspection Checklist based on EI/JIG 1530 requirements for upstream terminals (previously inspected 
as JIG 3 sites) is also available from the website. 
A JIG Inspection Checklist for smaller airports, based on Issue 3 of JIG 4 is currently being developed and will 
also be available from the website. 
JIG HSSE Management System Standard 
The JIG HSSE Management System Standard (Issue 2) is now available from the website, free of charge to all 
purchasers of JIG 1, JIG 2 or JIG 4. A bulletin summarising the changes made to Issue 1 and information 
about HSSEMS auditing is currently being developed and will be released later this month. 
Operating to JIG Standards 
Locations operating to JIG Standards 1 and 2 should comply with Issue 12 requirements before the end of 
2016 and the Issue 12 inspection checklists should be used by inspectors during 2016.

Operations on the JIG (JITS) Inspection Programme 
The Issue 12 inspection checklist (ADHIP) is now built into the JITS system and should be used by JIG 
Inspectors for all remaining 2016 JIG inspections of airport locations. 
The upstream S & D checklist is also in the JITS system and should be used by JIG Inspectors for all remaining 
2016 JIG inspections of upstream locations previously inspected in accordance with JIG 3.
